subject: master ant script and directories
msgSnippet: When calling an ant-script from a master ant-script in a different directory, junit tests in the original script - accessing files - lose their bearings.  The
messageBody:
When calling an ant-script from a master ant-script in a different
directory, junit tests in the original script - accessing files -
lose their bearings. The current path is now that of the calling ant-
script.

What can I do? Well, if I print out <echo message="${basedir}"/> in
the called ant-script, I get the correct directory. However, inside
the junit-tests, the world looks foreign.

regards, K*
